answers.answer: HiI too have very similar symptoms like these monthly.  I vomit once a month.  I figured that it coincided with my period, but aside from that I have no other clues.  I also get the low grade fever for about 24 hours along with it.  I have been tracking since April, not sure what to do about it.  Let em know if you discover anything else!

question: Since December 2007 I have had a 12 to 24 hour "virus" once a month.  Waves of nausea, vomiting, upper GI pain,foultarry stools, fatigue that lasts after the other symptoms stop. I always felt it coming on.  I would feel very hungry, even if I felt my stomach was full, I felt like I had very low blood sugar.  Once it was so bad I made an appt with my doctor.  My right hand went numb, I felt very faint, nauseous.  She ran blood test for Diabetes, Chrohn's.  But it was all normal.  Starting in May 2008 I started having it twice a month.  I ended up in the ER in July because the pain was so severe.  They ran all the tests, cat scan, ultra sound, blood, urine.  All they found was a UTI.  I was given  Macrobid for 7 days.  I actually felt great.  No fatigue, no lower abdominal pain, no leaking urine.  But the UTI wouldn't go away.  My doctor gave me 2 more weeks of the antibiotic, but it still wouldn't go away.  She wanted me to stay on it indefinitely.  But I felt that was unhealthy.  As soon as I stopped the antibiotic I became sick again. I started taking some naturopathic tinctures for UTI.  I didn't get any symptoms for  5 weeks!  I thought I was cured.  But again, same symptoms.  I got it again  9 days later.  Although this one hit me very suddenly.  I have changed doctors, but have to wait a month to be seen.  I haven't lost or gained weight.  I started excercising again, but when I became sick again I also became fatigued and depressed, disconnected.   Please does anyone know what this is?
title: I have had strange symptoms for 11 mos!!!!
